Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4

Class NewYorkController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.NewYorkController
public class NewYorkController
extends java.lang.Object
The NewYorkController class is the controller for the ny-view.fxml file. This class initializes UI components and handles user interaction events.
Author:
Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee

  • Constructor Details

    • NewYorkController

      public NewYorkController()

  • Method Details

    • addToOrder

      private void addToOrder()
      Create a NY pizza object with the user-selected modifications and add to current order.

    • updateSize

      private void updateSize()
      Called when new Size radio button clicked. Update prices based on pizza type and newly selected size.

    • updateView

      private void updateView()
      Update view (price, toppings, image) when a new pizza type is selected.

    • addTopping

      private void addTopping()
      Called when the button to add topping is pressed and the Build Your Own pizza type is selected. Price is recalculated and topping lists are updated if topping successfully added. Displays error if user attempts to add more than 7 toppings.

    • removeTopping

      private void removeTopping()
      Called when the button to remove selected topping is pressed and the Build Your Own pizza type is selected. Price is recalculated and topping lists are updated if topping successfully removed.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initialize UI components

    • reset

      private void reset()
      Reset view. Called after pizza is successfully ordered.

    • updateToppingLists

      private void updateToppingLists()
      Update ListView UI component containing available toppings and list of selected toppings

    • updatePrice

      private void updatePrice()
      Show price on TextField when pizza object is updated.
